segments.text: My attention shifts to the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a boy, bravely climbing on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where a cookie jar sits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR" and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in there, and a plate in the other, ready to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic secret cookie raid, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, hand outstretched, eager for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're such a team, quietly conspiring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool, though, looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tilted and its legs are splayed, almost like it’s dancing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission they don't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't fall with all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their faces are so serious about this endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a charming moment, despite the potential for a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR
